Posts.EditableText:
We are making a hall with different pictures and we want to figure out how to have our character look in one direction but then turn his head to look in a different direction. Would anyone have any information on this? 


----- Maybe we can have a panorama view looking north or south? Does anyone know if this is possible or have any tips?
Posts.HTML:
We are making a hall with different pictures and we want to figure out how to have our character look in one direction but then turn his head to look in a different direction. Would anyone have any information on this?

----- Maybe we can have a panorama view looking north or south? Does anyone know if this is possible or have any tips?

Posts.EditableText:
How about having 4 exits in hall . East and west normal exits . North and south  tick ' run script instead of moving.'
North
 Script 1 print 'You turn your attention toward the north  wall and the paintings there.
Script 2 show picture of north wall.
South
Script 1 print " you turn to examine the paintings on the south wall."
Script 2 show south picture
